quiz: SELECT f.frage, f.frage FROM quiz q INNER JOIN fragen f ON q.quizid = f.quizid WHERE q.quizid = $1 AND q.quizname = $2;
answers: SELECT DISTINCT q.quizid, f.frageid, a.antwort, a.ist_richtig FROM quiz q INNER JOIN fragen f ON q.quizid = f.quizid INNER JOIN antworten a ON f.frageid = a.frageid WHERE q.quizid = $1 AND q.quizname = $2 AND a.ist_richtig = 'true'
